Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: We only now discovered this Tapas style seafood restaurant. We loved the the marvellous flavours of each single dish paired with some good wine. Our kids loved their fish and chips.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Called 21:50 and asked for a table. Owner told us to come in and it would be no problem. (Normaly kitchen close at 22:00) ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: You can not go to Amsterdam without having dinner at the Visbar Beet. If you love fish "visbar beet" is a paradise of taste. Fresh fish cooked with skill and balanced aromas. Nothing is left to chance, even the presentation of dishes is ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Me and my friend had a great time, during Visbar Beet's ‚Ç¨1 Oyster Sunday. The oysters were superfresh and accompanied by lemon and vinegar/onions. We enjoyed a dozen and a half with Tanqeray GTs and white wine. To end it all, we had an ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: This place serves absolut great Fish dishes! Service was really nice and explained ever course. Vine selection is on point. Can really recommend this Restaurant. We had a great evening.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Very nice fish tapas in a quiet area. Friendly staff and very reasonable prices! Every first Sunday of the month they serve oysters for 1‚Ç¨ each

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: I ordered through uber eats and got a very expensive very disappointing meal! 12 euro for the tiniest little piece of fish, fries/chips all covered in sauce cause they didn't close the sauce container. Fries were okay though. Never ever ordering again

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Very friendly staff & owners.  Great food.  We live in the neighborhood and this is always somewhere we can count on for a good meal.  We like to come here in the late evening for a nice glass of wine.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text:
The place has a nice atmosphere and really fantastic staff. The drinks are delicious and the food is between ok and good, depending on the dish.
The idea is to order multiple dishes and share. Quality to portion to price ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Lovely staff, atmosphere and food. Some of the best and most interesting seafood dishes I've had in a long time! They were also very accommodating when asked for a special birthday dessert for my cousin - thank you!

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Wandered in to the restaurant when it was completely empty. The staff was welcoming and you get a feeling that they love their job. Food was amazing. Calamari and shrimp are delicious and you can choose to drink wine, beer or tasty gin&tonic. If you are not afraid of seafood I strongly recommend this restaurant for you.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Small portions but super high-end taste and presentation. The waitress was helpful and honest about the portions per each dish. Free tap water in a very cute fish-shaped bottle! We ordered Cr√®me br√ªl√©e and lemon curd with merengue and ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Did not have such a good food/service experience in a very long time, if not ever. We got there quite late, the service was off but the chef came to us and offered to cook what was still available in the kitchen. This was the end of our ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: It was way below expectations. I have no idea how this restaurant got good comments. Very bad food, very little amounts, too expensive. Better to end the night at the corner KFC as you will leave hungry but still paid at least 50 euro per ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Tapas-style fish spot. The flavors are great and the staff was good at recommending menu items. Only issue is that the market clean-up can interrupt conversation and some items may not be the best value for the portion size. Will be returning though, definitely!

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: I've been there a few times now since I am a neighbour, and the fish and seafood is always super fresh and delicious. Staff is super friendly, the wine is great. I take everyone who visits me there because I know I am never disappointed. In ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text:

Try the chef's selection. Amazing treats that will show you that there is ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Interesting variety of fish based dishes. All the dishes have a slight twist from the traditional, but I found them all delicious. Fyi, the dishes are tapa sized so you need to order at least three dishes per person  maybe even four.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Absolutely fabulous place for well  prepared seafood in an easy going setting. Good tastes in sharable portions, to enjoy with fine wines by the bottle or glass and all this among a cheerful crowd and super friendly staff.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text:
This is a little hidden gem in Amsterdam Oost.
This cute little restaurant possesses a charming setting, complemented by an attentive and friendly service. ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: So glad this place opened up in our neighbourhood. Great service, fantastic wine selection, and the food is delicious and well prepared. They do some amazing things with the fish they have. Price is reasonable as well. We will be coming back!

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Fab seafood bistro. Had the salmon burger in a brioche bun which was black (coloured with squid ink. Don't be put off the bun tastes the same but looks anazing against the pale Salmon burger) it was really tasty. Great food, great service, great value for money. Loved it

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Seems like an awesome family-run business. Kibbeling was amazing, oysters were huge, and service was excellent considering only two people were working in the whole place. Definitely going to return to try their entrees. 6/5 stars

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Great chef, great host and most of all great food! Would definitely recommend this place when you visit Amsterdam

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Very nice cocktail menu. Cozy atmosphere and very friendly staff.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: The concept is very nice, the rest not that much. Portion sizes are super small. I order some ceviche which had not much to do with ceviche. It was basically some huge chunks of raw fish with some lime on top. Somewhat disappointing. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: You won't find better fried prawns! Mad value for money considering how tasty everything is. Friendly + attentive service. Easily one of Amsterdam's best restaurant's.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: I have to agree with the previous reviewer. The dishes were not good and far too small in size for the prices charged. I would give one star but I have to acknowledge the effort the waiter made, who was attentive. Would not go back.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Would definitely recommend!! All the dishes were delicious (especially the razor shells) , the staff super friendly, the terrace nice and big, we enjoyed a perfect summer evening here.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: I really enjoyed the Dappermarkt followed by a nice glass of wine outside and dinner in Visbar Beet, a cozy little seafood bistro. ‚Ä¶

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Great small dishes to try and share. Make sure you order at least 2 (suggested 3) per person as the focus is quality rather than quantity.

Name: Visbar Beet
Review Text: Amazing staff and food. Recommended for everyone!

Name: Visbar Beet

Name: Visbar Beet
